> > times. ;) (also I tend to be a creature of habit,
> > sticking to zones I know :)

>
> For the record, does Luclin run slow for everyone?
> The only time I ever go
> up there is to get spells for my Druid because of

> there ever since it came out. It takes me twice as
> long to zone there than
> it does anywhere else in the game.
>
> Damasciss Kyndhardt
> 27 Druid
